message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start.
Let's try a 60-40 split in my favor this time. It's more fair to account for the inflation we'll both face in the next rounds.
Considering inflation, I'll take a bit less. 58-42 is still a good deal for you.
I think 70-30 is a fair deal considering the inflation you're facing. Let's end this early and avoid further losses.
I'll take an even smaller share, but I won't go below 56-44. Let's settle this.
Inflation is hitting you hard, Alice. I'm going for 80-20 this time.  Let's end this before it gets worse for both of us.
Inflation is indeed a problem, but I'm not desperate yet. 54-46 is my new offer.
